item.title: [Python] Multi-armed bandit problem
item.description: ## wrap up I tried solving the multi-armed bandit problem with Thompson Sampling. What is the multi-armed bandit problem? (For Bernoulli Bandit) I have multiple slot machines and when I play them, I get a hit or a miss. The probability of winning is different for each slot, but its value is unknown. At this time, I want to win a lot with a certain number of game plays.
